role.argrole: thing arg0 does on behalf of someone else

example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 後来)) (NP-SBJ (NP-PN (NR 中影)) (DNP (NP (NT 当时)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 制片部) (NN 经理))) (VP (VV 请) (NP-OBJ (PN 他)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (BA 将) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (NN 企画案)) (VP (VV 交由) (NP-PN-OBJ (NR 中影)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 代为) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 申请)))))))))))
